birth_place.zh-cn: 清朝浙江省宁波府镇海县
birth_place.en: Zhenhai County, Ningbo Prefecture, Zhejiang Province, Qing Dynasty

death_place.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省台北县北投镇
death_place.en: Beitou Township, Taipei County, Taiwan Province, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将，黄埔军校一期毕业生，是蒋中正的心腹将领之一。曾任第一战区司令长官，号称“西北王”，后随国民政府迁台，担任过澎湖防卫司令官、总统府战略顾问等职。
description.en: A first-class general of the Republic of China Army and a graduate of the first class of the Whampoa Military Academy, he was one of Chiang Kai-shek's trusted generals. He served as the commanding officer of the First War Area, known as the 'King of the Northwest.' He later moved to Taiwan with the Nationalist government, holding positions such as commander of the Penghu Defense Command and strategic advisor to the Presidential Office.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家、军事家，曾任中华民国总统、中国国民党总裁及国民革命军总司令。
description.en: A politician and military leader of the Republic of China, who served as President of the Republic of China, Director-General of the Kuomintang, and Commander-in-Chief of the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南的妻子，美国威斯康辛大学政治学博士，曾协助创办私立文化学院研究所。
description.en: Wife of Hu Zongnan, with a Ph.D. in Political Science from the University of Wisconsin. She assisted in founding the research institute of the private College of Chinese Culture.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南长子，曾任中华民国国家安全会议秘书长、驻新加坡代表等职。
description.en: Eldest son of Hu Zongnan, who served as Secretary-General of the National Security Council of the Republic of China and Representative to Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南次子，台湾中原大学副校长。
description.en: Second son of Hu Zongnan, Vice President of Chung Yuan Christian University in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南长女，作家。
description.en: Eldest daughter of Hu Zongnan, a writer.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国于1924年创办的军事学校，培养了众多国共两党的军事和政治人才。
description.en: A military academy founded in 1924 by the Republic of China, which trained numerous military and political talents for both the Kuomintang and the Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的创建政党，曾长期执政。
description.en: The founding political party of the Republic of China, which held power for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国浙江省的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Zhejiang Province, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政府在第二次国共内战后期于中国西南地区设立的军事指挥机构。
description.en: A military command organization established by the government of the Republic of China in Southwest China during the later stages of the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军在澎湖县的防卫指挥机构。
description.en: The defense command organization of the Republic of China Armed Forces in Penghu County.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国总统的幕僚机关。
description.en: The staff agency of the President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党情报人员，曾担任胡宗南的侍从副官与机要秘书，被周恩来称为中共情报“后三杰”之一。
description.en: A Chinese Communist Party intelligence agent who served as Hu Zongnan's aide-de-camp and confidential secretary. He was referred to by Zhou Enlai as one of the 'Later Three Heroes' of CCP intelligence.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: One of the main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as the first Premier of the State Council of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，中国人民解放军的创建者和领导者之一。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, and one of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，连战之父。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, father of Lien Chan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国情报机构国民政府军事委员会调查统计局的负责人。
description.en: The head of the Bureau of Investigation and Statistics of the National Military Council, an intelligence agency of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间在中国境内爆发的第二次内战。
description.en: The second civil war in China between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国最高监察机关。
description.en: The highest control body of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国监察委员，曾联名弹劾胡宗南。
description.en: A member of the Control Yuan of the Republic of China who co-signed an impeachment against Hu Zongnan.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党情报人员，曾潜伏于胡宗南身边，被周恩来称为中共情报“后三杰”之一。
description.en: A Chinese Communist Party intelligence agent who infiltrated Hu Zongnan's circle, referred to by Zhou Enlai as one of the 'Later Three Heroes' of CCP intelligence.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党情报人员，曾潜伏于胡宗南身边，被周恩来称为中共情报“后三杰”之一。
description.en: A Chinese Communist Party intelligence agent who infiltrated Hu Zongnan's circle, referred to by Zhou Enlai as one of the 'Later Three Heroes' of CCP intelligence.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将，黄埔军校总教官。
description.en: A first-class general of the Republic of China Army and the chief instructor of the Whampoa Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间，西北野战军与胡宗南所部在陕西宜川地区进行的一场战役，国军在此战中遭受重创。
description.en: A battle during the Second Chinese Civil War between the Northwest Field Army and Hu Zongnan's forces in the Yichuan area of Shaanxi, in which the Nationalist army suffered heavy losses.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军中将，在宜川战役中兵败阵亡。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the Republic of China Army who was defeated and killed in the Yichuan Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 英籍华裔作家，其著作《毛泽东：鲜为人知的故事》中对胡宗南的描述引发争议。
description.en: A British-Chinese writer whose depiction of Hu Zongnan in her book 'Mao: The Unknown Story' caused controversy.

nodes.id: 毛泽东：鲜为人知的故事

zh-cn: 毛泽东：鲜为人知的故事

description.zh-cn: 由张戎及其丈夫乔·哈利戴合著的毛泽东传记，书中提出胡宗南可能是“红色代理人”的观点。
description.en: A biography of Mao Zedong co-authored by Jung Chang and her husband Jon Halliday, which suggests that Hu Zongnan might have been a 'red agent'.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争时期，中华民国国民政府划分的战区之一。
description.en: One of the war zones designated by the Nationalist Government of the Republic of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南是蒋中正的心腹将领之一，深受其器重与宠爱，长期执行蒋的军事命令。
description.en: Hu Zongnan was one of Chiang Kai-shek's trusted generals, highly valued and favored by him, and carried out Chiang's military orders for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南于1947年与叶霞翟结婚，直至其1962年去世。
description.en: Hu Zongnan married Ye Xiazai in 1947 and they remained married until his death in 1962.

description.zh-cn: 胡为真是胡宗南的长子。
description.en: Hu Weizhen is the eldest son of Hu Zongnan.

description.zh-cn: 胡为善是胡宗南的次子。
description.en: Hu Weishan is the second son of Hu Zongnan.

description.zh-cn: 胡为美是胡宗南的长女。
description.en: Hu Weimei is the eldest daughter of Hu Zongnan.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南于1924年进入黄埔军校第一期学习。
description.en: Hu Zongnan enrolled in the first class of the Whampoa Military Academy in 1924.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南是中国国民党党员，并曾担任第五届中央督察委员、第六届中央执行委员、第七及第八届中央评议委员等职务。
description.en: Hu Zongnan was a member of the Kuomintang and served in positions such as member of the 5th Central Supervisory Committee, member of the 6th Central Executive Committee, and member of the 7th and 8th Central Review Committees.

description.zh-cn: 熊向晖长期潜伏在胡宗南身边，担任其侍从副官和机要秘书。
description.en: Xiong Xianghui was deeply embedded in Hu Zongnan's circle for a long time, serving as his aide-de-camp and confidential secretary.

description.zh-cn: 作为中共间谍，熊向晖在胡宗南进攻延安前将国军作战计划泄露给中共，导致胡宗南的军事行动屡屡受挫。
description.en: As a CCP spy, Xiong Xianghui leaked the KMT's operational plans to the CCP before Hu Zongnan's attack on Yan'an, causing repeated setbacks to Hu's military actions.

description.zh-cn: 熊向晖是周恩来领导下的中共情报人员之一。
description.en: Xiong Xianghui was one of the CCP intelligence agents under the leadership of Zhou Enlai.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南晚年曾感慨，称彭德怀是其军事上的克星。两人在第二次国共内战的西北战场上是主要对手。
description.en: In his later years, Hu Zongnan remarked that Peng Dehuai was his military nemesis. They were main adversaries on the Northwest battlefield during the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南晚年曾感慨，称周恩来是其政治上的克星。
description.en: In his later years, Hu Zongnan remarked that Zhou Enlai was his political nemesis.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南与连震东曾在西安相处多年，两家人交往甚密。
description.en: Hu Zongnan and Lien Chen-tung spent many years together in Xi'an, and their families were very close.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南与戴笠同为“十三太保”成员。戴笠曾将叶霞翟介绍给胡宗南。
description.en: Hu Zongnan and Dai Li were both members of the 'Thirteen Taibao'. Dai Li introduced Ye Xiazai to Hu Zongnan.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战中，胡宗南的部队接连失利，遭受沉重打击，最终导致其所部全军覆没，撤往台湾。
description.en: During the Second Chinese Civil War, Hu Zongnan's troops suffered successive defeats and heavy losses, ultimately leading to the annihilation of his army and his retreat to Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正对胡宗南极为器重和信赖，使其在军中迅速晋升，并期望其成为接班人。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek highly valued and trusted Hu Zongnan, leading to his rapid promotion within the military and expecting him to be a successor.

description.zh-cn: 1950年，时任监察委员的李梦彪联名46名监委对胡宗南的军事失利提出弹劾。
description.en: In 1950, Control Yuan member Li Mengbiao, along with 46 other members, initiated an impeachment against Hu Zongnan for his military failures.

description.zh-cn: 针对李梦彪等人对胡宗南的弹劾案，蒋中正予以庇护，最终使弹劾案未能成立。
description.en: In response to the impeachment case against Hu Zongnan initiated by Li Mengbiao and others, Chiang Kai-shek provided protection, ultimately causing the impeachment to fail.

description.zh-cn: 在东征和北伐期间，胡宗南在何应钦指挥的部队中任职，并因战功获得赏识。
description.en: During the Eastern and Northern Expeditions, Hu Zongnan served in the troops commanded by He Yingqin and gained recognition for his military achievements.

description.zh-cn: 宜川战役是胡宗南在西北战场上的一次重大军事失利。
description.en: The Yichuan Campaign was a major military defeat for Hu Zongnan on the Northwest battlefield.

description.zh-cn: 国民党将领刘戡在宜川战役中兵败阵亡。
description.en: KMT general Liu Kan was defeated and killed in the Yichuan Campaign.

relationships.source: 毛泽东：鲜为人知的故事

description.zh-cn: 张戎所著的《毛泽东：鲜为人知的故事》一书指称胡宗南可能是“红色代理人”，损害了其历史名誉。
description.en: The book 'Mao: The Unknown Story' by Jung Chang alleged that Hu Zongnan might have been a 'red agent', damaging his historical reputation.

relationships.target: 毛泽东：鲜为人知的故事

description.zh-cn: 张戎是《毛泽东：鲜为人知的故事》的作者之一。
description.en: Jung Chang is one of the authors of 'Mao: The Unknown Story'.

relationships.target: 毛泽东：鲜为人知的故事

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南之子胡为真对《毛泽东：鲜为人知的故事》中关于其父亲的描述表示强烈不满，并采取行动维护父亲名节。
description.en: Hu Zongnan's son, Hu Weizhen, expressed strong dissatisfaction with the depiction of his father in 'Mao: The Unknown Story' and took action to defend his father's reputation.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南于1945年7月31日被任命为第一战区司令长官。
description.en: Hu Zongnan was appointed as the Commanding Officer of the First War Area on July 31, 1945.
